scholarshipContent.title: Educational Service Contracting (ESC) Grantee
scholarshipContent.description: Government subsidy for Junior High School students enrolled in participating private schools.

scholarshipContent.title: Senior High School Voucher Program Recipient
scholarshipContent.description: Assists Grade 11 and 12 students in private schools through financial support from the Department of Education.

scholarshipContent.title: Tertiary Education Subsidy (TES)
scholarshipContent.description: Aimed at supporting qualified college students under the Unified Student Financial Assistance System for Tertiary Education (UniFAST).

scholarshipContent.title: Tulong Dunong Program (TDP)
scholarshipContent.description: Provides financial assistance to poor but deserving students enrolled in degree programs.

scholarshipContent.title: TESDA Programs
scholarshipContent.description: Skills training scholarships for technical and vocational courses through the Technical Education and Skills Development Authority.

scholarshipContent.title: DSWD Program
scholarshipContent.description: Educational support for marginalized and underprivileged sectors provided by the Department of Social Welfare and Development.

callToActionContent.heading: Ready to Apply for a Scholarship?
callToActionContent.description: Review the qualifications and submit your application to access these educational opportunities.
